attributes.action: Prevent gas and electricitiy utility companies from giving the consumer huge rises in bills whilst recording record profits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can the government allow gas and electricity companies to raise utility prices by upto 20% whilst working under the climate of sub inflation pay rises. The water industry is regulated so as companies must keep bills stable for 5 yrs and then show how any rises will be passed to the customer in terms of a better service. 
It should be illegal for any rise to be passed to the consumer whislt allowing astronomical profit - causing thousands of people (usually elderly or low income households) to struggle to have the necessity of heat and warmth.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/GasElectricity/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
